review: If they're used for live performances they will not last very long! Good for the price. I need to resolder the ends after a concert though.
Put my Schecter C-1 Custom FR in Drop Bb, these strings sound great and have a great low end. Highly reccomend.
Use it with an SM58 Shure mic in a studio type application. Holds up great, Mic does not slip. Upside down, sideways.
The pedal itself works perfectly fine. Using it as a foot pedal controller on my Korg Triton LE.IT SQUEAKS. Needs some WD-40 :)
2 15" speakers each with a horn built into the cabinet. These hold up great year round. I will more than likely take the speakers down to make sure they don't fall onto my baby grand...
TUBULAARRRRHolds my 8 string, 6 string, acoustic, etc.Has held up very sturdily over the year I've had it or so
